PATIENT_ID: TEST_BD_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-21 14:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-21 14:15:00
Category I trauma activation for 28-year-old male, stabbing victim.
Trauma activation level: Category 1.
Patient alert, BP 100/65, HR 110.
Active hemorrhage from left flank wound.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-21 14:30:00
Patient taken emergently to OR for exploratory laparotomy.
Blood gas not obtained prior to OR.

[OPERATIVE_NOTE] 2026-01-21 16:00:00
Exploratory laparotomy performed. Small bowel injury repaired.
Hemostasis achieved. Patient stable post-op.
